page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN WINCANTON
page.content:
"My Dad works at{Plesseys}in Temple- combe, making underwater missiles. He travels by car."
"My Dad works as a{tanker cleaner}at {Wincanton Transport.}He works on the computer wash and the outside wash. My Mum is an office cleaner at{Unigate. They go to the Social club and Country & Western sing-a-longs.My sister works in an office. My brother is a general worker in Spar{supermarket.}He likes to walk the dog in his spare time. My other brothers work in Unigate."
"Dad is a{Transport Manager}at the {Blackmore Vale Creameries.}Mum is a housewife.My brother Neil is a trainee manager at Gateways supermarket. Matthew hopes to be a Medical Assistant in the{Navy.}Sean goes to King Arthurs School."
